channel.title: Apply Within - Recently Added Listings - Career Exploration

item.title: "What Should I Do With My Life?" by Po Bronson
item.description: Shares the stores of dozens and dozens people on their quest to determine what's next for them. What's great about this book is that every story isn't tied up with a neat bow. Much the learning for the subjects, the readers and the author is in the exploration and the process.
item.author: admin
